remarks: The matrix transformation is a 1-1 function from the matrices onto the constant polynomial matrices.  (Contributed by AV, 19-Nov-2019.)
statement:
m2cpmfo.s $e |- S = ( N ConstPolyMat R ) $.
m2cpmfo.t $e |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) $.
m2cpmfo.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
m2cpmfo.k $e |- K = ( Base ` A ) $.
m2cpmf1o $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T : K -1-1-onto-> S ) $.
